fixes.name: Priority Flag
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Overall Health] = "Excellent " &&
    'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Priority Segment] = "Top Priority ",
    1,
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level Tableau IF condition to a DAX calculated column. Replaced Tableau logical AND with && and transformed column references to 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[ColumnName] format. The expression returns 1 when both conditions match the exact string literals (including trailing spaces), otherwise 0.
